Poem

what my body knows
is not a lie it’s not
a lie i tell you it is not
it’s nothing short of truth
and nothing larger
my past lodges

 

                 W.S. MERWIN “SEPARATION”
Your absence has gone through me
Like thread through a needle.
Everything I do is stitched with its color.
